item.title: Version 10.6.4
item.description:
About v10.6.4 Update

  • v10.6.4: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.6.3: __HoldingKeyToKey__ has been improved at you pressed modifiers while holding target key down.
  • v10.6.2: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.6.1: Prepared settings have been updated.
Karabiner Web Site
